column5: Trendy, modern east side Austin home. We are 5 minutes from the airport, 10 minutes to the city center (SXSW, ACL), and a short bike ride from dreamy parks and hike and bike trails. We are just minutes from fun and activities on Austin's famous east side--trendy restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and more.   Whether you're a traveler, tourist, or here on business, my place is the best home base for all your adventures!  Just a 5 minute walk to a bus stop leading directly downtown on 7th street.
column8: Casa de Mac- Private bed/bath in Austin's eastside
